QueryDefinition.Query:
with test_upd as ( select medcode, eventdate, patid, staffid, enttype, case when ABS(data1) - FLOOR(ABS(data1))=000 then cast(cast(data1 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data1 as varchar(256)) end as data1, case when ABS(data2) - FLOOR(ABS(data2))=000 then cast(cast(data2 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data2 as varchar(256)) end as data2, case when ABS(data3) - FLOOR(ABS(data3))=000 then cast(cast(data3 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data3 as varchar(256)) end as data3, case when ABS(data4) - FLOOR(ABS(data4))=000 then cast(cast(data4 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data4 as varchar(256)) end as data4, case when ABS(data5) - FLOOR(ABS(data5))=000 then cast(cast(data5 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data5 as varchar(256)) end as data5, case when ABS(data6) - FLOOR(ABS(data6))=000 then cast(cast(data6 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data6 as varchar(256)) end as data6, case when ABS(data7) - FLOOR(ABS(data7))=000 then cast(cast(data7 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data7 as varchar(256)) end as data7, case when ABS(data8) - FLOOR(ABS(data8))=000 then cast(cast(data8 as bigint) as varchar(256)) else cast(data8 as varchar(256)) end as data8 FROM Test JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID )
SELECT t.medcode, t.eventdate, t.patid, cast((cast(t.patid as bigint)*100000000)+(year(t.eventdate) *10000)+ (month(t.eventdate)*100)+ day(t.eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, t.staffid, t.enttype,
-- 4 data fields CASE WHEN e.data_fields = 4 and l_d1_79.[text] != 'Data Not Entered' THEN t.enttype ELSE NULL END as [4df_source_value], l_d1_79.[text] as [4df_value_as_string], case when l_d1_79.text = 'Not examined' then 4301433 when l_d1_79.text = 'Potential Abnormal' then 40567538 when l_d1_79.text = 'Present' then 4181412 when l_d1_79.text = 'Unknown' then 4129922 when l_d1_79.text = 'Normal' then 4069590 when l_d1_79.text = 'Absent' then 4132135 when l_d1_79.text = 'Abnormal' then 4132135 when l_d1_79.text in ('+','++','+++') then 0 when l_d1_79.text = 'Below low reference limit' then 40567536 when l_d1_79.text = 'Above high reference limit' then 40567535 when l_d1_79.text = 'High' then 4328749 when l_d1_79.text = 'Low' then 4267416 when l_d1_79.text = 'Negative' then 40567548 when l_d1_79.text = 'Nil' then 4125556 when l_d1_79.text = 'Outside ref range' then 0 when l_d1_79.text = 'Positive' then 40567546 when l_d1_79.text = 'Potentially abnormal' then 40567538 when l_d1_79.text in ('Significantly High', 'Significantly Low') then 0 when l_d1_79.text ='Trace' then 9192 when l_d1_79.text= 'Unknown' then 42894201 when l_d1_79.text = 'Very High' then 4123513 when l_d1_79.text = 'Very Low' then 4125550 end as [4df_value_as_concept_id], t.data2 as [4df_range_low], t.data3 as [4df_range_high],
-- 7 data fields CASE WHEN e.data_fields in (7,8) and t.data2 is not null THEN t.enttype ELSE NULL END as [7df_source_value], replace(isnull(l_d1_54.text,'') + ' ' + cast(t.data2 as varchar(20)) +' ' + isnull(l_d4_79.text,''),'Data Not Entered', '') as [7df_value_as_string], t.data2 as [7df_value_as_number], t.data5 as [7df_range_low], t.data6 as [7df_range_high], cast(l_d3_77.text as varchar(20)) as [7df_units_source_value],
-- enttype 311, data7 peak flow device type CASE WHEN t.enttype = 311 and t.data7 is not null and l_d7_57.text != 'Data Not Entered' THEN cast(t.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-7' ELSE NULL END as [311_source_value], l_d7_57.text as [311_value_as_string],
--enttype 284, data8 expected delivery date CASE WHEN e.data_fields = 8 and t.data8 is not null and t.data8 not in ('0', '2', '3') THEN cast(t.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-8' ELSE NULL END as [284_source_value], cast(dateadd(d,-cast(t.data8 as int) - 10,'12-31-2014') as varchar(20)) as [284_value_as_string],
right(t.patid,3) as care_site_id, null endDate, medcode original_source FROM test_upd t LEFT JOIN Entity e on t.enttype = e.code LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l_d1_79 ON t.data1 = cast(l_d1_79.code as varchar) and l_d1_79.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'TQU') LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l_d4_79 ON t.data4 = cast(l_d4_79.code as varchar) and l_d4_79.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'TQU') LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l_d1_54 ON t.data1 = cast(l_d1_54.code as varchar) and l_d1_54.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'OPR') LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l_d3_77 ON t.data3 = cast(l_d3_77.code as varchar) and l_d3_77.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'SUM') LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l_d7_57 ON t.data7 = cast(l_d7_57.code as varchar) and l_d7_57.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'PFD') where eventdate is not NULL
